text: Lyagushino () is a rural locality (a village) in Chernovskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 21 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 6 km south-east from Chernovskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Lyagushino
